metadata.title: CVE-2018-14452 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libgig 4.1.0. There is an out-of-bounds read inthe "always assign the sample of the first dimension region of this region"feature of the function gig::Region::UpdateChunks in gig.cpp.

criterions.comment: libgig package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
